Technical Data:
--------------
Type: Suite
License: Shareware (includes Medicine)
Category: Video
Language: Multi.
Platform: Windows 7, Vista, Windows XP

Today there are tens of compressed video formats. Each has advantages and disadvantages, which convert files from one format to another is an indispensable operation, especially if you enjoy them on any player.

CyberLink MediaEspresso is an excellent video converter. CyberLink MediaEspresso maintains the ease of use and power of his older brother, further simplifying file operations.

MediaEspresso CyberLink Video Convert is a breeze, you drag the clips to the window or use the buttons to add an entire folder. Support for the latest formats such as MKV (Matroska) and RM, is complete. Do you see the thumbnails? A double-click and open MediaEspresso CyberLink preview.

The conversion can be configured for multiple files at once or each one separately. MediaEspresso CyberLink offers many export profiles, ready for devices as diverse next-generation mobile com (Android or iPhone, to name two), media players and even game consoles.

With CyberLink MediaEspresso the conversion is rapid, especially when the computer has a graphics card compatible with CUDA and Stream. The conversion profiles can be exported, something useful to share special configurations with a friend. Finally, export to YouTube and Facebook on your videos to the Web.

Among the flood of mediocre converters that populate the landscape, CyberLink MediaEspresso features a transparent appearance and power to handle high-definition formats. It is true that the options, as well as export formats are few, but MediaEspresso CyberLink has chosen to focus on what matters most. That should be all domestic converters.
CyberLink MediaEspresso supports the following formats:

Import: MKV, RM / RMVB, FLV, AVI, MPEG, MPEG-2, MOV (H.264), WMV, MP4, DVR-MS. TS, MPG, ASF, M2T, M2TS, MTS, DV-AVI, TiVo, VOB, VRO, MOD, DAT, TOD, WTV (1 single channel)
Export: MPEG-2, MPEG-4, MPEG-4 AVC, WMV, DivX
